# <a name="permanently-delete-email"></a><span data-ttu-id="4a947-102">Slette e-mail</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4a947-102">Permanently delete email</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4a947-103">Hvis du vil slette email eller tømme din Indbakke:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4a947-103">If you want to delete email or empty your inbox:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="4a947-104">Marker de meddelelser, du vil slette (eller Vælg cirklen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4a947-104">Select the messages you want to delete (or select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="4a947-105">Næste til **Indbakke** i toppen af meddelelseslisten for at markere alle meddelelser i din indbakke).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4a947-105">next to **Inbox** at the top of your message list to select all messages in your inbox).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="4a947-106">Vælg **Slet** øverst på siden (for hele mappen **tom mappe**eller **Tom fokuseret** / **tom andre** , hvis du har fokuseret Indbakke aktiveret).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4a947-106">At the top of the page, select **Delete** (for the whole folder **Empty folder**, or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if you have Focused Inbox enabled).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="4a947-107">Hvis du vil fjerne alle slettede e-mail, Åbn [mappen Slettet post](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) , og vælg **tom mappe**, vælg derefter **genoprettelige elementer** i toppen af siden, og vælg **Tøm mappen** igen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4a947-107">To purge all your deleted email, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder**, then select **Recoverable items** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4a947-108">Hvis du vil vide mere, kan du læse [slette e-mail i Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4a947-108">To learn more, read [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
